Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか薄暗くて 気味の悪いところだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's kinda dark and creepy in here.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり、こんな時は、ボクの コワーいお話だよ。ね、<Annie>♪
Entry.EnglishText: Y'know, right about now would be a great time for one of my scaaary stories. Right, <Annie>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 階段続きだけに、怪談ってか？ うわっはははは!!
Entry.EnglishText: So we're in for a scare going up these stairs? Wahahaha!
Entry.Notes: Lit. 怪談 is Ghost Story but is homophone for Stairs so we follow the tried and true TOR tradition.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれ、どうしてかな？ コワい話、 まだなのに、寒くなってきたヨ……
Entry.EnglishText: Huh, what's this? I've yet to tell my scary story, but something's already making me cringe.
Entry.Notes: 寒い means both trembling with fear and lame (of a joke)
